name: .G
description:
G is about a pilot traveling in space with a broken spacecraft.
Space pilot G, who travels through the vast universe with a broken AI auto-navigation system, is the best pilot on Earth.
Sometimes I avoid meteors with a quick sense and travel using bombs at the right time.
Can G, tired of endless travel, find what he wants to find in this vast universe?
Be G and find something that G wants to find!

.G is a game that competes for time by avoiding with arrow keys and WASD and bombs.
As time goes by, death approaches in various ways, and the environment only gets harsh!
Compete with your friends in local rankings!
